channel.title: Devion's Realm [PI] - Warrior's Guild
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Fg-1huCxKg
not all that hard to do , but i just got bored and came up with this idea =D Post below or on the vid on YT , tell me what you think =D

item.title: Devion's Realm [PI] - Warrior's Guild
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

DivineSouls:

Everyone is right here, it’s rather simple, and can be done fairly quickly. Of course that is if you know what you the language. I don’t know how you receive the tokkul, but if it’s simple like killing a monster, you could try and mimic the way that Jagex does it. By placing armor on the platforms. It’s a good start, but needs improvement.

Amen…

Read full topic

item.title: Devion's Realm [PI] - Warrior's Guild
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

DivineSouls:

Everyone is right here, it’s rather simple, and can be done fairly quickly. Of course that is if you know what you the language. I don’t know how you receive the tokkul, but if it’s simple like killing a monster, you could try and mimic the way that Jagex does it. By placing armor on the platforms. It’s a good start, but needs improvement.

the client i am using does not have the warriors guild building , and adding the part of the map with castle will make it look rubbish as some walls wont load properly.
If the animated armours were added i would definately add that , but for now , i’m using tokkul which is obtained in TzHaar
